meanings.definition: Showing happiness or amusement by turning up the corners of the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The little girl had a smiling face as she played with her toys.
meanings.sent2: She always feels happy when she sees her smiling friends at school.
meanings.sent3: The smiling sun peeked through the clouds, making everyone feel cheerful.
meanings.sent4: The smiling flowers in the garden seemed to brighten up the whole yard.
meanings.sent5: His smiling eyes sparkled with joy as he opened the gift.

meanings.definition: Having a pleasant or friendly expression.
meanings.sent1: The kind old man had a smiling face that made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper greeted us with a smiling face as we entered the store.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a smiling look as if it knew a secret no one else did.
meanings.sent4: The smiling moon in the night sky seemed to watch over the sleeping town.
meanings.sent5: Her smiling voice on the phone always made him feel at ease.
